subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Lowry, a relatively unheralded Irishman, turned in an unexpectedly sharp display to surge past Jim Furyk and Justin Rose and fend off a charging Bubba Watson.
snippet: Lowry, a relatively unheralded Irishman, turned in an unexpectedly sharp display to surge past Jim Furyk and Justin Rose and fend off a charging Bubba Watson.
